feat: migrate from MongoDB to Supabase

- Replace MongoDB/Mongoose with Supabase PostgreSQL

- Create complete database schema \(27+ tables\) in supabase/schema.sql
- Update all services \(flights, hotels, index\) to use Supabase operations
- Add graceful handling for missing Stripe/Mailjet credentials
- Remove all mongoose dependencies from services layer

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
